items.title: Customizable article header
items.description: Moved article header to its own partial template, allowing you to customize the article header layout in custom views without modifying the main template.

items.title: Test infrastructure updates
items.description: Improved the automated testing pipeline by excluding unnecessary files and optimizing test execution order for better reliability.

items.title: End-to-end test fixes
items.description: Fixed issues with automated end-to-end tests to improve development workflow and code quality assurance.
